attributes.action: let housing benefit be decided on a case by case basis not age.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Currently housing benefit is decided on your age, if you are under 25 you are only entitled to benefit for a single room in shared accomodation. 

This is not a fair way of deciding housing benefit as not everyone under the age of 25 shares accomodation with others. 

Just because someone is under 25 does not mean they will be sharing accomodation and only renting one room. 

The benefit should be decided on a case by case basis not by age.
